titleStmt.title: A plain path-way opened to the simple-hearted for the answering all doubts and objections which do arise in them against the light and truth in the inward-parts, by which many are kept from obedience and so from peace to their panting souls / by Stephen Crisp.
titleStmt.author: Crisp, Stephen, 1628-1692.
